source.name: Lab 2.1 Exploring the Actions Folder - Rasa Actions Module Usage
source.instructions: **Fill in the blank to complete the statement about the Rasa custom action code.**
source.text: The action uses the <<<datetime>>> module to check the current day of the week.
source.guidance: In the action_bank_hours.py file, the datetime module is imported and used to determine the current day of the week with statements like datetime.datetime.now().weekday() to implement the logic for bank hours.

text: module to check the current day of the week.
